title: Shakespeare Ryze (Please)
body:
_**PLEASE **make this skin Riot! _

**Abilities: 
**
 - Overload: A blob of jet black ink. 
 - Rune Prison: Swirled words like Shakespeare's handwriting, twisting like a rope. 
 - Spell Flux: Same as Overload. 
 - Desperate Power: Words fly around him and he gets darker from ink. 

**Model: **
 - Ryze with a frilly Shakespearean neck thing with traditional Shakespearean (Elizerbethan Era) clothes. 
 - The scroll, old parchment with more defined black writing with a giant quill through it.  
 - The book: a group of folded parchment (I'm not sure about this part.) 

**Reasons to make this skin: **
 - It targets the more historical and literature enthusiasts fanbase, which is lacking in my opinion. 
 - Its an instabuy for Ryze players who love English history. (I know i will instabuy it if it comes out) 
 - Takes a new perspective of Ryze
 - An aesthetically pleasing skin of Ryze, unlike most of the others (Besides White-Beard and Dark Crystal) 
 - Another skin on a cheap champion who's increasingly more played (Thus more people would be looking at skins) 

Hope you see this! 

~Catspeare {{champion:13}}
